resources.string: We give our best to show you with this system how to achieve good results for your body. Results can not be guaranteed, they also highly depend on the eating and training habits of the user. Generally we recommend for every new kind of sport or workout, please firstly consult your doctor.

How long should I use this program?\n As many other programs, we recommend at least 12 weeks to obtain very good body results. How can I cancel the subscription? Go to your App Stores Settings > view the APPLE-ID > view „Subscriptions“ > change the settings.
